data.title: Altered Carbon by Richard Morgan, First Edition, Signed
data.meta_description: Altered Carbon: Download Blues Signed Ed. (a special first printing signed by richard k.morgan) by Morgan, Richard K.; Hoskin, Rik and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Soft cover. Condition: Fine. Chris Moore (illustrator). 1st Edition. A fine UK first edition, first printing paperback original (slight wear, minor creasing to spine) - no dustjacket (as issued) - All my books are always securely packed with plenty of bubblewrap in professional boxes and promptly dispatched (within 2-3 days) - SIGNED & PREPUBLICATION DATED (6/2/02) BY THE AUTHOR - Pictures available upon request. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. 1st Edition. The true first edition, first printing of this bold SF novel, the recipient of the 2002 Philip K Dick SF award. Both the book and the dust jacket would be described as brand new, except the book may have been (very carefully) read. It's very clean and crisp with a wisp of reading evidence to the tightness. The author signed the title page, dated 5/2/02, the year it was published. A really lovely copy. (Shipping from within USA.). Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. First edition (& 1st printing). SF novel. The author's first book. Made into a TV series in 2017. SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR. Fine copy in a fine dustjacket (as new) but for just a little browning along page edges.

Hardback. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Chris Moore (illustrator). 1st Edition. London, Gollancz, 2002. First Edition. First Impression. Hardback. A near fine copy, signed by the author without inscription. Morgan's first novel, and winner of the 2003 PKD Award. A tour-de-force opening novel in a highly-regarded trilogy. Block a little tanned, slight fading to the spine. Cover art by Chris Moore [9621, Hyraxia Books]. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. First Edition. First Editon/First Printing. Hardcover. Fine book in a fine priced dust jacket, with tanning to the page edges. Signed and dated in the year of publication by the author on the title page. Debut novel and winner of the 2003 Philip K Dick award. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Wie neu. Dust Jacket Condition: Wie neu. Vincent Chong (illustrator). 1. Auflage. One of a limited edition of 500 numbered copies signed by the author. Altered Carbon is the novel that put Richard K. Morgan on the map and is known nowadays as successful Netflix series. The copy for sale is in as new condition. It is number 306. Signatur des Verfassers.
